[

{title, "Hidden Element"},

{see_also, [base, textbox]},

{usage, "#hidden { id=hidden1, text=\"Some text\" }"},

{description, "The hidden element produces a hidden input element."},

{attributes, [

	{"text", "string", "The value of the hidden element."},
	
	{"html_encode", "boolean", "Set to true to safely html-encode the text."}

]}

].
